name: MoreOptionsHelper
description: This will redirect customers over to the tech support, billing, or customer service.

plainTextMessage.value: Okay let's get you to the right department. In a few words, say what you need help with. For example, if you need to pay a bill. Simply say 'billing'.
Okay let's get you to the right department. In a few words, say what you need help with. For example, if you need to upgrade your service. Simply enter 'upgrade service'.
Okay let's get you to the right department. In a few words, say what you need help with. For example, if you need to activate a new modem. Simply enter 'new modem'.
